page.title: 05HOUSES-OLD
page.content: Before most of the housing estates were built the land was farmland.{ {Roseacres}got its name because there were acres of land owned by a lady named {Rose}.In{Stoneleigh}there used to be a horse paddock ,an orchard ,a boundary fence and got its name from a manor.It was built in{1888}and a doctor lived there.As{Sawbridgeworth} is not an{industrial}area the majority of jobs are concerned with{agriculture {or small businesses.}Farmhouses and cottages are spread out all over the area. My house is old,it's made out of bricks on the outside and wood and lath and plaster on the inside and the walls are hollow.We used to have an old kitchen range in what is now the living room.The people who lived here before us used to get their water from a pump in our back garden.
